role.argrole: disease / illness (usually marked by ب / في)

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (NP-SBJ (NOUN زوج) (NP (POSS_PRON_1S ي))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM مريض) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القلب))))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نستطيع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC توفير) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدواء))))) (PUNC ") (PUNC .))
